Race.SpecificTitle: Chief of Police -- Town of Lake Providence
Parishwide Proposition No. 1 of 3 -- 8.24 Mills Renewal - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of East Carroll, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), be authorized to continue to levy an eight and twenty-four hundredths (8.24) mills tax on all property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $369,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2023 and ending with the year 2032, for the purpose of constructing, maintaining and administering Parish public drainage and canals, ditches and other public drainage facilities?

Race.SpecificTitle: Parishwide Proposition No. 2 of 3 -- 8.24 Mills Renewal - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of East Carroll, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), be authorized to continue to levy an eight and twenty-four hundredths (8.24) mills tax on all property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $369,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2023 and ending with the year 2032, for the purpose of constructing, maintaining and administering Parish roads and bridges?

Race.SpecificTitle: Parishwide Proposition No. 3 of 3 -- 2 Mills Renewal - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of East Carroll, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), be authorized to continue to levy a special tax of two (2) mills on the property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $90,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2023 and ending with the year 2032, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating an enhanced 911 telephone system (including the payment of necessary dispatch personnel), in the Parish?
